results.title: Simvastatin attenuates oleic acid-induced oxidative stress through CREB-dependent induction of heme oxygenase-1 in renal proximal tubule cells.

results.title: Ezetimibe and recent clinical trials: a look on the bright side.

results.title: A reappraisal of the risks and benefits of treating to target with cholesterol lowering drugs.
